column4: I have a client running a website on ubuntu that has been infected with malware, I want to remove the iframe that was placed on every php and html file. does anyone know how I could do this via the command prompt?
yes a single line which is an iframe
on every file of the site, which is about 35k plus files :( ya sure
a little sed oneliner that removes the line and find would be able to do it ...
